ai-mil3.1.6:1.2_0: “Venerable sir, there is no one who looks for him.”
ai-mil3.1.6:1.4_0: “Who to neither conveys herself nor dismisses anyone.”
ai-mil3.1.6:1.5_0: who he takes it, and does not rejoice?
ai-mil3.1.6:1.6_0: “Great king, he does not look forward to enjoying the defilements.”
ai-mil3.1.6:1.8_0: “Great king, if I ask you to enjoy continue. I will not cling to them.”
